property.value: Auto Once per turn: When this card attacks a Battle Card and your opponent has 4 or more cards in Rest Mode, switch this card to Active Mode. Auto: When this card KOs an opponent's Battle Card, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Permanent: If your opponent has 2 or more Battle Cards in play in Rest Mode, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 1. Auto: When you play this card from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards in Rest Mode, and it can't be switched to Active Mode until the end of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dragon Ball. Activate Main: Draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your Battle Cards, and it can attack Battle Cards in Active Mode for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dragon Ball. Activate Main Draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your Battle Cards and it gains Blocker until the end of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you combo with this card, choose up to 1 Son Goku : Br card, Vegeta : Br card, or Gogeta : Br card from your Drop Area and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: EX-Evolve 8: Gogeta : Br with an energy cost of 6. Barrier. Auto: When a card evolves into this card, take the top 6 cards from your deck and add them to your energy. Activate Main Once per turn: If you have 15 or more energy, choose up to 4 of your opponent's life and place them at the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main Once per turn: Choose 1 green card from your Battle Area other than this card and place it in your Drop Area : Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: EX-Evolve YY: Yellow Broly : Br card with an energy cost of 7. Double Strike. Permanent: If the total number of cards in Rest Mode between you and your opponent is 8 or more, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 4. Activate Main Once per turn: Choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area : If your opponent has 3 or more energy, choose up to 1 of your opponent's cards in Rest Mode and place it in its owner's Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: This card can't attack. Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and KO it, then choose up to 1 Desire card with an energy cost of 2 or less from your Drop Area and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Union-Fusion 3: Red Son Goku : Br and red Vegeta : Br. Blocker. Barrier. Auto When this card is KO'd, if your Leader Card is a blue Gogeta : Br card, choose up to 1 red Son Goku : Br card and 1 red Vegeta : Br card from your Drop Area and add them to your hand. If you added 2 cards to your hand, add 2 cards from the top of your deck to your energy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Union-Fusion 7: Red Son Goku : Br and red Vegeta : Br. Blocker. Barrier. Auto: When you play this card with Union, add 3 cards from the top of your deck to your energy.

property.name: Text
property.value: EX-Evolve YY: Yellow Broly : Br card with an energy cost of 4. Permanent: If the total number of cards in Rest Mode between you and your opponent is 6 or more, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 3. Auto: When you play this card, you can only activate skills on cards that are green or yellow and no other color for the duration of the turn. Activate Main: Once per turn: Choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area : Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in Rest Mode and that card can't be switched to Active Mode until the end of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: :Permanent If the total number of cards in Rest Mode between you and your opponent is 3 or more, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 2. Activate Main: Once per turn: Choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards in Rest Mode and that card can't be switched to Active Mode until the end of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: EX-Evolve: Red Baby card with an energy cost of 4. Double Strike. Auto: When a card evolves into this card, draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, it gets -5000 power for the duration of the turn, and you can't play Super Baby 1, Parasitic Menace for the duration of the turn. Activate Main R: Choose 1 Baby card with an energy cost of 6 from your hand and play it on top of this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blocker. Permanent: If you have 1 or more copies of both Tapion and Minotia cards in your Drop Area and a Phantom Demon card isn't in play in your Battle Area, you can play this card from your hand without paying its energy cost. This card gets -10000 power during your turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto Burst 3: When you play this card from your hand, choose up to 1 Namekian or Universe 7 card from your hand with an original energy cost of 4 or less, negate its skills for the duration of the turn and play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Swap 8, Sparking 7 YYYY: Goku's Lineage card with an energy cost of 8. Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, switch it to Rest Mode, and draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Over Realm 4. Permanent: All Demigra cards in your hand with energy costs of 7 gain Xeno-Evolve 3: Demigra. Auto When you play this card, you can't play non-black Battle Cards for the duration of the turn, and your opponent can't attack with Battle Cards with an original power of 10000 or less until the end of their next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks a Leader Card, draw 1 card, and this card gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn. Awaken: When your life is at 5 or less : You may draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your energy, switch it to Active Mode, and flip this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Activate Main Once per turn: Choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with 10000 power or less and KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Triple Strike. Dual Attack. Permanent: If your Leader Card is a Gogeta : Br card and your life is at 2 or less, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 4. You can only have up to 1 SSB Gogeta, Critical Combination in play in your Battle Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a red Shenron card, choose up to 3 Dragon Ball cards from your deck, place them in your Drop Area, then shuffle your deck. If you placed cards in your Drop Area, choose up to 1 A King's Return to Youth from your deck, activate it, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a blue Shenron card, choose up to 2 Dragon Ball cards from your deck, add them to your hand, then shuffle your deck. If you added cards to your hand, choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play or combo with this card, if your Leader Card is a green Shenron card, choose up to 3 Dragon Ball cards from your deck, place them in your Drop Area, then shuffle your deck. If you placed cards in your Drop Area, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 1 and KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: If a Frieza or Sorbet card is in play in your Battle Area, you can play this card from your hand without paying its energy cost. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a yellow Shenron card, choose up to 1 Dragon Ball card from your deck and place it in your Drop Area, then shuffle your deck, draw 1 card, and you can't play Tagoma, Frieza's Loyal Servant for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Barrier. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a black Saiyan card, place the top 5 cards of your deck in your Drop Area. Activate Main: 1, place this card in its owner's Drop Area : Choose 1 black Battle Card with 19000 power from your Drop Area and play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card from your hand, activate this skill. At the end of this turn, if there is a card that is both blue and yellow in your energy, draw 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand and place it in your Drop Area, then choose up to 1 of your blue or yellow energy and switch it to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card from your hand, activate this skill. At the end of this turn, if there is a card that is both red and green in your energy, draw 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand and place it in your Drop Area, then choose any number of your opponent's Battle Cards with a total energy cost of 3 or less and KO them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Critical. Auto: When this card is KO'd or placed in a Drop Area from a Battle Area by an opponent's skill, choose up to 1 red Battle Card with an original energy cost of 2 or less from your hand and play it with its skills negated for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a World Tournament card and you have 4 or more energy, you may choose 1 card from your hand and place it on top of your deck. If you do, choose up to 1 Supreme Showdown Vegeta from your deck, play it, then shuffle your deck. Auto: When this card is placed in a Drop Area from a Battle Area by a skill, choose all of your red xe3x80x8aWorld Tournamentxe3x80x8b cards and they can't be KO'd for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main, Once per turn: Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, and it can't attack or be placed in your opponent's Combo Area until the end of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main: If your Leader Card is a World Tournament card: You may choose 1 World Tournament card in your hand and place it in your Drop Area. If you do, choose up to 2 red World Tournament cards with different names and energy costs of 3 or less from your deck, play them, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a World Tournament card, look at up to 1 card from the bottom of your deck, choose up to 1 Vegeta Jr., Heroic Successor from it, play it, then shuffle your deck. Activate Main, Once per turn: Choose 1 Vegeta Jr., Heroic Successor in Rest Mode in your Battle Area and switch it to Active Mode: At the end of the turn, choose up to 1 of your energy and switch it to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Critical. Activate Main: If your Leader Card is a World Tournament card: Place this card from your hand at the bottom of your deck, then draw 1 card. Auto, Once per turn: When this card is switched to Active Mode by Son Goku Jr., Heroic Successor's skill, choose up to 1 Son Goku Jr., Heroic Successor in Rest Mode in your Battle Area and switch it to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: If your Leader Card is a World Tournament card and you don't have any Battle Cards in play in your Battle Area, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 2. Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 Hercule, Proudest Grandpa from your hand and play it. Auto: At the end of your turn, you may place this card on top of its owner's deck. If you do, choose up to 1 Pan, Proudest Daughter from your deck, play it, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 World Tournament card with an energy cost of 5 or less from your deck, send it your Warp, shuffle your deck, and at the start of your next turn, add that card sent to your Warp by this skill to your hand from the Warp. Activate Main 2, if your Leader Card is a World Tournament card and you place this card in it's owner's Drop Area : Choose up to 1 World Tournament card with an energy cost of 3 or less from your hand, send it to your Warp, and at the start of your next turn, play the card sent to your Warp by this skill from your Warp.

property.name: Text
property.value: Counter Attack: Negate the attack and play this card. Auto: When you play this card, if your opponent has 2 or less energy, your opponent can't attack with Battle Cards with energy costs of 2 or less for the duration of the turn unless they choose 1 card from their hand and place it on top of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: If your opponent has a Field card in their Battle Area, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 2. Auto: When you play this card, you may choose 1 Field card in a Battle Area with an energy cost of 1 or less and place it in its owner's Drop Area. If you do, this card gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Activate Main: If you have 4 or more energy: You may choose 2 World Tournament cards in any Battle Areas, negate their skills for the duration of the turn, and place them in their owner's Drop Areas. If you do, play this card from your hand, and you can't activate King Piccolo, Limitless Power's Activate Main skill for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main GGGG, if your Leader Card is a World Tournament card and you have 5 or more energy : Choose 1 card in your life and place it in your Drop Area, then choose up to 1 Destined Conclusion Hero from your deck, play it on top of this card, and shuffle your deck. If you played a card, choose up to 1 Destined Conclusion Piccolo Jr. from your hand and play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Counter Battle Card Attack: Negate the attack, and if there is a green God card in play in your Battle Area, place this card on top of the attacking card. At the end of your next turn, place this card (and only this card) in its owner's Drop Area. (While this card is on top of another card, the card underneath it is not treated as a Battle Card and can't activate any of its skills.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main Y, if there are a total of 2 or morexe3x80x8aWorld Tournamentxe3x80x8b cards in play in all Battle Areas: Play this card from your hand, and you can't play Son Goku, Savage Great Ape for the duration of the turn. Auto: When this card is removed from a Battle Area by a skill, if you have 4 or more energy, you may choose 2 cards from your hand and place them in your Drop Area, then choose 1 of your yellow energy and switch it to Rest Mode. If you did both, choose up to 1 Unyielding Victory Son Goku and 1 Unyielding Victory Jackie Chun from your deck, play them, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main YY, if your Leader Card is a World Tournament card and you have 4 or more energy: Place this card on top of its owner's deck, then choose up to 1 Unending Moves Tien Shinhan from your deck, play it, and shuffle your deck. If you played a card, choose up to 1 Unending Moves Yamcha from your hand and play it in Rest Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose 1 card in your life and add it to your hand. Activate Main 1, choose 1 card in your life and add it to your hand: Choose up to 1 Moon-Destroying Kamehameha from your deck, add it to your hand, shuffle your deck, then negate this skill for the duration of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Counter Play: Play this card. Auto: When you play this card, if it is your opponent's turn, you may place this card in it's owner's Drop Area. If you do, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost greater than their energy, ignoring Barrier, switch it to Rest Mode, and that Battle Card can't be switched to Active Mode until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Battle: If your Leader Card is a Jackie Chun card, it gets +15000 power for the duration of the Battle, then you may choose 1 of your Battle Cards in Rest Mode and place it in its owner's Drop Area. If you do, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 World Tournament Arena from your deck or Drop Area, add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deflect. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a World Tournament card, choose up to 8 World Tournament cards from your hand with different names that aren't Announcer cards and play them.
